title: Do Not Disturb On New Client
body: I've noticed in my friends list occasionally that instead of saying 'Online' or 'Away', it says 'Do not disturb' with the blue 'In Game/Queue' dot, but the option to select it is not there. What's going on with this?

replies.body: It looks like a bug. There's two other reports of this [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/nqwjxExz-do-not-disturb-bug) and [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/NcV4tUuA-do-not-disturb). Are you still seeing this? It might be worth sending in a bug report.
